name: Magic Shards
description:
This game is built for GDevelop Game Jam 2: "Pets and/or Companions".

In this game, 3 different magic shards accompany the player to defeat the incoming waves of monsters. Each shard has different abilities and powers. 

Survive incoming waves of monsters! Good luck :)

Controls: Keyboard & Mouse

- W, A, S, D keys to move. 1,2,3 keys for choosing the companion shard. 

- Aim with the mouse.

- Either click the mouse to shoot, or use the auto shooting.
